summary: Successfully completed the CSV parser component integration for the SearchScreen. The CSV parser component was already properly implemented with full functionality including file upload, CSV parsing with quote handling, data preview with configurable row display, column selection for search queries, and export capabilities. The component is fully integrated into the SearchScreen with state management for showing/hiding the parser, handling CSV data processing, and displaying extracted search queries with individual query management options.
current_status: The CSV parser webcomponent has been successfully implemented and integrated into the SearchScreen. Users can now upload CSV files, preview the data, select columns for search queries, and use the extracted queries for searching. The implementation includes proper error handling, loading states, and a user-friendly interface with data preview capabilities. The component is fully functional and ready for use.
